Getting Started.question: What is Swan-IRA and how does it work?
Getting Started.answer: Swan-IRA is a cryptocurrency trading platform that allows you to buy, sell, and manage digital assets securely.

Getting Started.question: How do I create an account?
Getting Started.answer: To create an account, click the 'Sign Up' button and follow the on-screen instructions.

Getting Started.question: What documents do I need for verification?
Getting Started.answer: You will need a government-issued ID and proof of address for verification.

Getting Started.question: How long does account verification take?
Getting Started.answer: Account verification typically takes 1-2 business days.

Getting Started.question: What cryptocurrencies can I trade?
Getting Started.answer: You can trade Bitcoin, Ethereum, and a wide range of other cryptocurrencies.

Getting Started.question: Is Swan-IRA available in my country?
Getting Started.answer: Swan-IRA is available in most countries. Please check our website for the full list.

Account Management.question: How do I reset my password?
Account Management.answer: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page and follow the instructions.

Account Management.question: How do I enable two-factor authentication (2FA)?
Account Management.answer: Go to your account settings and enable 2FA under the security section.

Account Management.question: How do I update my personal information?
Account Management.answer: Navigate to your profile and click 'Edit' to update your information.

Account Management.question: How do I close my account?
Account Management.answer: Contact support to request account closure.

Account Management.question: What should I do if my account is locked?
Account Management.answer: If your account is locked, please contact support for assistance.

Trading & Orders.question: What trading pairs are available?
Trading & Orders.answer: We offer a wide range of trading pairs including BTC/USD, ETH/USD, and more.

Trading & Orders.question: What's the difference between spot, futures, and options trading?
Trading & Orders.answer: Spot trading is immediate, futures are contracts for later, and options give you the right but not the obligation to buy/sell.

Trading & Orders.question: How do I place a buy/sell order?
Trading & Orders.answer: Go to the trading page, select your pair, and use the order form to place a buy or sell order.

Trading & Orders.question: What order types are supported (market, limit, stop-loss)?
Trading & Orders.answer: We support market, limit, and stop-loss orders.

Trading & Orders.question: What is quantitative trading and how does it work?
Trading & Orders.answer: Quantitative trading uses algorithms and statistical models to automate trades.

Trading & Orders.question: How does the AI arbitrage feature work?
Trading & Orders.answer: Our AI arbitrage scans markets for price differences and executes trades automatically.

Trading & Orders.question: What are the minimum order amounts?
Trading & Orders.answer: Minimum order amounts vary by asset. Please check the trading page for details.

Deposits & Withdrawals.question: How do I deposit funds to my account?
Deposits & Withdrawals.answer: Go to the Wallet page and click 'Deposit' to see available options.

Deposits & Withdrawals.question: What payment methods are accepted?
Deposits & Withdrawals.answer: We accept bank transfers, credit cards, and select cryptocurrencies.

Deposits & Withdrawals.question: How long do deposits take to process?
Deposits & Withdrawals.answer: Deposit times depend on the method. Crypto is usually instant, while bank transfers may take 1-3 days.

Deposits & Withdrawals.question: How do I withdraw cryptocurrency?
Deposits & Withdrawals.answer: Go to the Wallet page, click 'Withdraw', and follow the instructions.

Deposits & Withdrawals.question: What are the withdrawal limits?
Deposits & Withdrawals.answer: Withdrawal limits depend on your verification level. See the Limits page for details.

Deposits & Withdrawals.question: Why is my withdrawal pending?
Deposits & Withdrawals.answer: Withdrawals may be pending due to security checks or network congestion.

Security & Verification.question: How do you protect my funds and personal information?
Security & Verification.answer: We use industry-leading security measures including encryption, cold storage, and regular audits.

Security & Verification.question: What is KYC (Know Your Customer) verification?
Security & Verification.answer: KYC is a process to verify your identity and comply with regulations.

Security & Verification.question: Why do I need to complete identity verification?
Security & Verification.answer: Identity verification is required to comply with laws and protect your account.

Security & Verification.question: How do you store cryptocurrencies?
Security & Verification.answer: We store most funds in secure offline cold wallets.

Security & Verification.question: What should I do if I suspect unauthorized access?
Security & Verification.answer: Immediately change your password and contact support if you suspect unauthorized access.

Fees & Limits.question: What are your trading fees?
Fees & Limits.answer: Our trading fees are competitive and depend on your trading volume. See the Fees page for details.

Fees & Limits.question: Are there deposit or withdrawal fees?
Fees & Limits.answer: Some deposit and withdrawal methods may incur fees. See the Fees page for details.

Fees & Limits.question: What are the daily/monthly trading limits?
Fees & Limits.answer: Trading limits depend on your verification level. See the Limits page for details.

Fees & Limits.question: Do you offer fee discounts for high-volume traders?
Fees & Limits.answer: Yes, we offer discounts for high-volume traders. Contact support for more information.

Technical Issues.question: I'm experiencing issues with the platform. What should I do?
Technical Issues.answer: Try refreshing the page or clearing your browser cache. If the issue persists, contact support.

Technical Issues.question: How do I report a bug?
Technical Issues.answer: Use the 'Report a Bug' form in the support section or email us at support@swan-ira.com.

Legal & Compliance.question: Is my data safe and compliant with regulations?
Legal & Compliance.answer: We comply with all relevant data protection and privacy regulations.

Legal & Compliance.question: Where can I find your terms of service and privacy policy?
Legal & Compliance.answer: Our terms of service and privacy policy are available at the bottom of our website.
